title: Landing Page Flow Configuration
description: Defines the sequence of steps/pages in a landing page flow with layout resolution strategy

layout.description: Global layout path for all steps (e.g., 'layouts/main'). Templates use this layout with StepContent placeholder replaced by step-specific layouts. Applied unless overridden by step-specific layout.

steps.description: Ordered list of steps in the landing page flow

id.description: Unique identifier for the step (used for tracking navigation and loading step-specific content)

type.description: Type of step: 'normal' renders as main page replacing current content, 'popup' renders as overlay on top of current page

oneOf.description: Load component schema from steps/{id}/ folder

layout.description: Step-specific layout override. Takes precedence over global layout. Set to null to load from steps/{id}/desktop.json and steps/{id}/mobile.json instead of layouts folder.
